page.title: 11Vandalism in North St.Helens
page.content: There are different types of{ {vandalism.}The most common is { {graffitti }which appears written every where in our area. Bottlebanks, toilets, walls, telephone boxes and signs are all favourite targets. Much of the graffitti is done with felt tip pens and carving on wooden targets is done. Telephone boxes have their sets ripped out and window smashed. Toilets have to be boarded up due to constant misuse as do empty houses. {Vandalism}occurres in some public houses with damage to the fittings being all too common.{Plastic waste {bins}have been constantly set on fire and this destroys the bins. {Windleshaw Brook}having been cleared by the Water Board had rubbish thrown in within days, litter was everywhere.
